meanings.definition: A spread made from vegetable oils and animal fats, resembling butter.
meanings.sent1: My mom bought a tub of oleomargarine for our toast.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for butter, but I used oleomargarine instead.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, someone mistook oleomargarine for butter and spread it on their sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as oleomargarine, melting hearts wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The oleomargarine melted on the hot pancakes, creating a golden pool of deliciousness.

meanings.definition: To spread or use oleomargarine as a substitute for butter.
meanings.sent1: I will oleomargarine the bread before putting it in the oven.
meanings.sent2: When we ran out of butter, I had to oleomargarine my toast.
meanings.sent3: He tried to oleomargarine his way out of trouble, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: She oleomargarined her words carefully, trying not to offend anyone.
meanings.sent5: The chef decided to oleomargarine the recipe, making it healthier for everyone.
